<text text-anchor="start" x="31584" y="-282.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 75 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="31504,-66 31504,-273 31793,-273 31793,-66 31504,-66"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31517.5" y="-255.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Grief, big time grief. So much grief that you're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31529.5" y="-240.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> not worried about what that guy over there</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31514.5" y="-225.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> thinks of you, or what that guy over there thinks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31510" y="-210.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> of you or thinks about, you know, whether or not,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31520" y="-195.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "He didn't bow," or "He didn't cross himself."</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31513" y="-180.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Are these thoughts crossing your mind? So, how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31535.5" y="-165.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> many people, sort of, giggled when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31530" y="-150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> pictured Peter Ivanovich walking up to the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31525" y="-135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> coffin? If you didn't, that's okay. But now in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31526.5" y="-120.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> reflection you can, you should, because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31544.5" y="-105.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> satirizing Peter Ivanovich. What's his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31533" y="-90.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> relationship with Ivan Ilych? What's their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31611.5" y="-75.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> relationship?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="31503,-273 31503,-273 31794,-273 31794,-273 31503,-273"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="31502.5,-65 31502.5,-301 31793.5,-301 31793.5,-65 31502.5,-65"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="31171,-133 31171,-205 31467,-205 31467,-133 31171,-133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31177" y="-187.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Yes, very good, and how many of you people have</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31185" y="-172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> ever been to a funeral before? Viewing, and you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31192.5" y="-157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> all, when you're there, like, what emotion are</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31215" y="-142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you experience, experiencing? St 20?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="30857.5" y="-150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> of these, like, how would you describe it? What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30877.5" y="-135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> he's doing, I mean, he's tripping over the</text>

<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="29242,-21 29242,-318 29538,-318 29538,-21 29242,-21"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29253" y="-300.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> What? {"How to live.", St. 12} How to live very</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29251.5" y="-285.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> good. How to live. Let's get some more questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29248" y="-270.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> from you guys. And when we have our discussions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29273.5" y="-255.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> guys, I want you to think, think a little bit</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29263.5" y="-240.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> deeper than just the comprehension. I already</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29281.5" y="-225.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> assume that you've read it and that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29275.5" y="-210.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> understand the book let's talk about, like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29265" y="-195.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> some of those bigger philosophical questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29257.5" y="-180.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about life and death and how to live and how to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29283.5" y="-165.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> treat death. Let's try to think that way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29258.5" y="-150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> because this is our opportunity to examine how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29248.5" y="-135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> we live our lives and how we look at death. This is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29263.5" y="-120.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> our opportunity, we're looking at death subje-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29301" y="-105.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I'm sorry, objectively instead of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29292" y="-90.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> objectively. We're looking at death</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29273" y="-75.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> objectively without any emotion attached,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29271" y="-60.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> this is our chance to examine our lives and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29257.5" y="-45.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> potentially our own deaths someday long, long,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29306.5" y="-30.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> long, in the far future. St. 19?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="29241,-318 29241,-318 29539,-318 29539,-318 29241,-318"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="28943.5" y="-255.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Pure' is a good word, yea. Morally superior,</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="28933" y="-225.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> comparison to those of the upper class. So, here</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28937" y="-210.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> we are in chapter one, already seeing Tolstoy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28946" y="-195.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> attiude about the Russian upper class of the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="28943" y="-165.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> bless you, how they're selfish, how they feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28937" y="-150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about death, how they treat one another, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28951" y="-135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I think that's pretty significant and I think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28943" y="-120.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> through all of this, his end goal, as we'll talk</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28939.5" y="-105.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about as we continue to, to read, is what St. 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28938.5" y="-90.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> said, through all of this, his goal is to teach us</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28997" y="-75.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that big theme which is?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="28926,-273 28926,-273 29207,-273 29207,-273 28926,-273"/>

<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="15852,-1273 15852,-1300 16146,-1300 16146,-1273 15852,-1273"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15931" y="-1282.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 101 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="15852,-946 15852,-1273 16146,-1273 16146,-946 15852,-946"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15880.5" y="-1255.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Yes, fake. {some laughter from class} So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15875.5" y="-1240.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> everybody, like, I know it sounds funny, but</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15877" y="-1225.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> ingrain that word into your memory for this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15880" y="-1210.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> book, because that's what these people are.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15878.5" y="-1195.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> These people are fake. They only do things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15874" y="-1180.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> because society says that they should. Okay?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15872.5" y="-1165.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> They only do things because society says that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15859.5" y="-1150.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> they should. Why did Ivan Ilych get married? Did</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15869.5" y="-1135.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> he love her? Did we read that chapter yet? Oh,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15868.5" y="-1120.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it's not two yet? Anybody read ahead? No? So,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15878" y="-1105.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you'll find, when you read the next chapter,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15863.5" y="-1090.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that he didn't marry her because he loved her, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15887.5" y="-1075.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> married her because society said that he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15883" y="-1060.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> should. And Peter Ivanovich isn't worried</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15881.5" y="-1045.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about the sadness he's feeling because he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15879" y="-1030.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> lost his best friend, he's only worried about</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="32244" y="-1550.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Yea, let's go out and play cards. Let's go out and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32247" y="-1535.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> play cards, right? "Let's hurry up and get out of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32249.5" y="-1520.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> here so we can play cards." Meanwhile, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32258.5" y="-1505.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> supposed to be their friend, their colleague,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32240.5" y="-1490.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> right? Let's go back to the idea of the widow. The</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32255.5" y="-1475.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> widow is talking to Peter Ivanovich. "Hey is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32231" y="-1460.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> there any way where I can get some more money out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32244" y="-1445.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> of the government from this? Like, now that my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32249.5" y="-1430.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> husband's dead, can I get some more money?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32258.5" y="-1415.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Right? So, that part is funny but what else?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32282.5" y="-1400.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Where are they right now? St. 17?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="31310" y="-1490.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> {overlapping} Good! Good! Another reason for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31323" y="-1475.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> us to laugh! You should all be giggling out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31327" y="-1460.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> there, this is funny stuff. Go ahead, St. 8.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="31303,-1508 31303,-1508 31582,-1508 31582,-1508 31303,-1508"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="31302.5,-1450 31302.5,-1536 31581.5,-1536 31581.5,-1450 31302.5,-1450"/>
</g>
<!-- 175 -->
<g id="node160" class="node"><title>175</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30991,-1545 30991,-1572 31268,-1572 31268,-1545 30991,-1545"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31061.5" y="-1554.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 175 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30991,-1413 30991,-1545 31268,-1545 31268,-1413 30991,-1413"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31004" y="-1527.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Absolutely. Absolutely! You kinda can't help</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31000" y="-1512.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> but laugh at these people, right? Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31006" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> you to stop and ask yourself, "Do I have my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31025" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> priorities in line? Am I living my life</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31016" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> correctly? I don't behave like this, do I?"</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30997" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Cause this obviously is not the right way to live</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31002" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> according to Tolstoy, and I think we probably</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="31081" y="-1422.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> know that. St. 8?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="30990,-1545 30990,-1545 31269,-1545 31269,-1545 30990,-1545"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="30989.5,-1412.5 30989.5,-1573.5 31268.5,-1573.5 31268.5,-1412.5 30989.5,-1412.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 173 -->
<g id="node161" class="node"><title>173</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30658,-1530 30658,-1557 30954,-1557 30954,-1530 30658,-1530"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30738" y="-1539.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 173 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30658,-1428 30658,-1530 30954,-1530 30954,-1428 30658,-1428"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30676.5" y="-1512.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> {laughter from Teacher} Yeah, I mean, when,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30681.5" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> when she's crying about her husband's death,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30690" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> she is easily able to control herself, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30670" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> But then, later on when we find that she can't get</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30685" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> anymore money, that she's really sad right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30664" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> What else is funny about that situation? Mmhmm?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="30657,-1530 30657,-1530 30955,-1530 30955,-1530 30657,-1530"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="30657,-1427.5 30657,-1558.5 30955,-1558.5 30955,-1427.5 30657,-1427.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 171 -->
<g id="node162" class="node"><title>171</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30328,-1605 30328,-1632 30622,-1632 30622,-1605 30328,-1605"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30407" y="-1614.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 171 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="30328,-1353 30328,-1605 30622,-1605 30622,-1353 30328,-1353"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30356.5" y="-1587.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Yea. Do you sort of look at this and say to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30341" y="-1572.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> yourself, "Wow, these people are clueless. Why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30351.5" y="-1557.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> are they so, so silly, so oblivious?" Are you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30344.5" y="-1542.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> are you kinda looking at them, like, "Duh, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30334" y="-1527.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> should know better than to behave that way." How</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30348" y="-1512.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> many people are thinking that in their minds?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30387.5" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Like, she's definitely not acting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30345" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> appropriately. Okay, and I think Tolstoy wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30355.5" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> those things, that you kind of giggle at like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30348.5" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> that, I think he wants those things to stick out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30342" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> like a sore thumb to you. This is your chance to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30351.5" y="-1422.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> stop and examine your life and ask yourself,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30339.5" y="-1407.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "Would I ever do anything like that? I'm not this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30356.5" y="-1392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> selfish, am I?" And I think that's really his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30342" y="-1377.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> goal. When you see them do things like this, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30336.5" y="-1362.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> wants you to stop and look at your own life. Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="30327,-1605 30327,-1605 30623,-1605 30623,-1605 30327,-1605"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="30327,-1352.5 30327,-1633.5 30623,-1633.5 30623,-1352.5 30327,-1352.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 163 -->
<g id="node166" class="node"><title>163</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="29380,-1575 29380,-1602 29674,-1602 29674,-1575 29380,-1575"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29459" y="-1584.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 163 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="29380,-1383 29380,-1575 29674,-1575 29674,-1383 29380,-1383"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29387.5" y="-1557.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> The wife right? The widow! Sorry, um yes, this is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29399" y="-1542.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> the widow, right? She should be like, "Oh my</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29395.5" y="-1527.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> gosh! My poor husband!" But instead she says,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29386" y="-1512.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> "Oh it was awful, I don't know how I bore through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29389" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it all! It was so hard on me! It was unbearable for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29400.5" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> me to stand the pain he was facing!" Are you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29387" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> kidding! So, how many people laughed when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29399" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> read that part? You should've laughed, and it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29403" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> okay now that you know, if you didn't, that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29387.5" y="-1422.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> okay, but now that you know, you should laugh at</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29408" y="-1407.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> these people when they say things like this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29404" y="-1392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> okay? Because why? Why is it funny? Yea?</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="29379,-1575 29379,-1575 29675,-1575 29675,-1575 29379,-1575"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="29379,-1382.5 29379,-1603.5 29675,-1603.5 29675,-1382.5 29379,-1382.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 156 -->
<g id="node171" class="node"><title>156</title>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="28041,-1515 28041,-1557 28327,-1557 28327,-1515 28041,-1515"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28111.5" y="-1539.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 156 - STUDENT 2</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28169" y="-1524.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">NON</text>
<polygon fill="white" stroke="none" points="28041,-1428 28041,-1515 28327,-1515 28327,-1428 28041,-1428"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28062" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Um it says uh, "He screamed for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28056.5" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> without pausing for breath, it was unbearable.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28047" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> I don't know how I bore through it all. You could</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28051.5" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> hear him three rooms away. Oh, what I've been</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28156" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> through."</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="28040,-1515 28040,-1515 28328,-1515 28328,-1515 28040,-1515"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="28040,-1427.5 28040,-1558.5 28328,-1558.5 28328,-1427.5 28040,-1427.5"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="27737,-1515 27737,-1542 28005,-1542 28005,-1515 27737,-1515"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27803" y="-1524.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 155 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="27737,-1443 27737,-1515 28005,-1515 28005,-1443 27737,-1443"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27747.5" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Okay, the author is mocking or ridiculing or</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27750.5" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> making fun of something. What's the satire</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27743" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> there? If you find it, can you read it for us? ...</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27783.5" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> So, on page 38. ... Okay, St. 2.</text>

<!-- 153 -->
<g id="node174" class="node"><title>153</title>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="27173,-1590 27173,-1617 27462,-1617 27462,-1590 27173,-1590"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27249.5" y="-1599.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00">TURN 153 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="yellow" stroke="none" points="27173,-1368 27173,-1590 27462,-1590 27462,-1368 27173,-1368"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27187" y="-1572.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> Okay, so, pretty painful. Yea, alright now, you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27194.5" y="-1557.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> guys can think of the worst pain you've ever</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27187" y="-1542.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> imagined, which I'm thinking, breaking a bone</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27192" y="-1527.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> might be that, I'm not sure, um but this guy's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27179.5" y="-1512.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> probably in so much pain and I think maybe it's a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27181" y="-1497.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> combination of pain and denial at the same time,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27185.5" y="-1482.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> it's so much pain that he screams for three days</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27197" y="-1467.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> straight. So, take your worst pain and think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27179" y="-1452.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> about how miserable he must have been. Can you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27185" y="-1437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> picture that? Pretty awfu? And now, what is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27188.5" y="-1422.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> satire that Tolstoy uses there? Go to that page,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27182" y="-1407.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> see if you can figure out what the satire is. What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27192.5" y="-1392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> is satire by the way? You all defined it at the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27279.5" y="-1377.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00"> start of class.</text>
<polygon fill="black" stroke="black" points="27172,-1590 27172,-1590 27463,-1590 27463,-1590 27172,-1590"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="black" points="27171.5,-1367.5 27171.5,-1618.5 27462.5,-1618.5 27462.5,-1367.5 27171.5,-1367.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 152 -->
